title: Kdp keyword research 2023 find kdp keyword for your book listing

tactics.name: Incognito Keyword Research
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search bar in incognito mode to bypass personalized tracking and retrieve original keywords.
steps: Add modifiers like 'for kids' or 'journal' to expand keyword suggestions
caveats: May not capture all keyword variations
source_quotes: In Incognito all the cookies on the trackers are blocks so the Amazon algorithm can't track everything I do on sites

heuristics.name: Seasonal Trend Monitoring
heuristics.condition: If a keyword shows spikes in Google Trends during specific months, it indicates seasonal demand
source_quotes: the keyword for composition notebooks just blows up in Google around August

claims.statement: Amazon's algorithm personalizes search results based on user behavior
source_quotes: the Amazon algorithm is very very sophisticated you can learn it can adapt it can just monitor everything you're doing around the sites

niche_patterns.description: Combine product type with seasonal demand and specific use cases to identify trending niches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Captures both search volume and specific buyer intent
source_quotes: the keyword for composition notebooks just blows up in Google around August
